title: Logic busters requested
author: VD
content_html:
Especially atheists or agnostics. If you’re willing to hit a chapter hard and ID the holes, email me. I’m NOT looking for a debate here nor will I waste any time on one.

Email me if you’re SERIOUSLY interested, I intend to give a single chapter to each odd couple as they come. Put TIA in the subject.
content_text:
Especially atheists or agnostics.  If you’re willing to hit a chapter hard and ID the holes, email me.  I’m NOT looking for a debate here nor will I waste any time on one.
